overview: A typical story of a hopeless Filipino worker whose last resort is to work abroad to save his family from poverty.  Melo trudge the desert to look for greener pasture but it seems like it is too far and hard to reach.  His family here in the Philippines was left in a maze and each of them had to find his/her way out.  On his homecoming, which welcome will hurt him most: his torn pocket or his broken home and heart?
tagline: When does a family stop to laugh and start to cry?
title: Napakasakit, Kuya Eddie
